column1: Smoque BBQ////Food:I ordered the chopped brisket sandwich with sides of the slaw and beans
column2: plus an order of the cornbread. My husband ordered the sliced brisket platter with slaw and French fries. Everything was fine
column3: but after hearing so many great things about it we both kind of shrugged like "thats it? this is what everyone has been talking about". I live within walking distance to this place and haven't bothered going back :(
